1.16.5.B2:
- Added elemental essence energy
- Improved application of effects
- [Bugfix] Air armor can no longer be obtained in the creative
You can download the mod by following the link: https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/keepers-of-the-stones
1.16.5.1.1.18:
- Completed element - greenery
- Slightly improved the staff of energy
- [Bugfix] The eclipse spell will no longer be used at any time except during the day
- [Bugfix] Fixed the staff of energy
- [Bugfix] Fixed a bug with font shadows in interfaces
- [Bugfix] Fixed the registry of letters in the Use your Power achievement
You can download the mod by following the link: https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/keepers-of-the-stones
1.16.5.1.1.20:
- Added a new game rule - The player receives stones when entering the world
- [Bugfix] Fixed the stones tag
- [Bugfix] Fixed version numbering
You can download the mod by following the link: https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/keepers-of-the-stones
1.16.5.1.1.30:
- The /resetchoice command has been replaced with the /resetmychoice command to reset your chosen stone
- Game rule - Getting stones at the entrance will now be enabled by default
- Added a warning in the logs about using keepInventory
- The mod has been optimized
- An empty stone has been removed
You can download the mod by following the link: https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/keepers-of-the-stones
1.16.5.1.2.0:
- All the basic functions of the 24 main elements have been completed
- All elemental armor items now have a single texture
- Improved the /resetmychoice command and now if you have not selected a stone, you can simply enter the command and select
- [Bugfix] Fixed a bug with using items without activated stone
- [Bugfix] Fixed a bug when using stones with the keepInventory game rule enabled
You can download the mod by following the link: https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/keepers-of-the-stones
1.16.5.1.2.1:
- Removed the tab with experimental stones
- [Bugfix] Fixed bug where items with an activated stone could disappear when appearing
You can download the mod by following the link: https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/keepers-of-the-stones
1.16.5.1.3.0:
- Added a gamerule - Prohibit the use of spells when the stone is not activated
- Added new plants for the master of greenery
- Improved sound reproduction from the master of sound
- Now the tamer spell is recharged after use
- Improved graphical interface of some spells
- [Bugfix] Fixed a bug where the armor remained after death with the activated stone and the keepInventory gamerule
You can download the mod by following the link: https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/keepers-of-the-stones
1.16.5.1.3.1:
- [Bugfix] Fixed the use of milk when causing game crashes and stone cloning
You can download the mod by following the link: https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/keepers-of-the-stones
1.16.5.1.3.2:
- [Bugfix] Fixed a bug where armor and items were not displayed when playing with friends
You can download the mod by following the link: https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/keepers-of-the-stones
1.16.5.1.3.5: - There will be no more mod updates for this version of Minecraft! Please update it!

1.17.1.1.0.0:
- Mod moved to Forge 1.17.1
- New texture of the water flow projectile
- Now water drops only have an effect while they are in the player's hand
- Added new magical boxes
- Added a separate tab for magic boxes
- Added elements of 8 elements from group A
- New tab icon with magic stones
- An empty stone has been added, it can be crafted using glass and 4 Nether stars
- Added the mod logo
- Added a mod update script
- Added some things for future mod updates
- [Bugfix] It is no longer possible to use multiple stones at the same time
- [Bugfix] Now, after death, the stone returns
- [Bugfix] Fixed wooden box hitbox
- [Bugfix] Fixed dup of shields
- [Bugfix] Fixed a bug where the shield could be used several times when it was in the spare hand
- [Bugfix] Fixed a bug where a player could use a shield and after the end of the wizard effect, the shield could return
You can download the mod by following the link: https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/keepers-of-the-stones
1.17.1.1.1.0:
- Added new element spells: rain bow, magma shield, Tornado battle axe, crystal dagger, lava hammer, water katana, fire sword, air rapier
- Lightning strike and energy staff now work as weapons and deal damage
- Increased earth fist damage
- Added 4 new slots in the stone box for future elements from group A
- [Experimental] Added the ability to combine some stones
- [Experimental] Added inferno merger
- [Bugfix] Fixed errors with Russian translation
You can download the mod by following the link: https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/keepers-of-the-stones
1.17.1.1.1.10:
- The stones being developed will now be in a new tab
- Added a new tab in the inventory for various items
- Added andesite box
- Added an achievement - Use your power!
- Now when the player goes to bed, he loses the transformation, but the stone does not recharge after sleeping
- After the player's death, the stones will now recharge
- Added the ability to activate an empty stone
- New mod logo
- Changed the icons of the effects of the masters of fire, ice, greenery and lava
- Increased the attack speed of the water katana
- The imitator's interface no longer closes when using
- Slightly improved shield code
- Simplified detransformation key code
- Removed crafting stones
- [Experimental] Added 6 elements from group M
- [Experimental] Added 5 elements from group G
- [Experimental] Added geyser merge
- [Bugfix] It is no longer possible to put any items in empty caskets that do not have elements yet
- [Bugfix] Fixed GUI for some stone on the server
- [Bugfix] Fixed bugs with some shields
- [Bugfix] An empty stone no longer contains a stack of 64
- [Bugfix] Removed items that should not be in the inventory
- [Bugfix] Fixed a bug that caused the snow golem creation spell to drop when a player died
You can download the mod by following the link: https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/keepers-of-the-stones
1.17.1.1.1.11:
- [Bugfix] The Cosmos Stone now returns after death
- [Bugfix] Fixed a bug with the wrong file to check for updates
You can download the mod by following the link: https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/keepers-of-the-stones

- Added sounds of activation and deactivation of stones
- Now the staff of energy can absorb the energy of the stones of creation and destruction
- The metal shield now consists only of iron 
- Redesigned mechanics of the tornado creation item
- Improved the mechanics of the staff of energy
- [Experimental] Added coal merge
- [Bugfix] Fixed a bug with the disappearance of an item issued by a random item

1.17.1.1.4.1:
- Added saturation effect when using vampirism
- Added special abilities to the R key
- Added a reactive movement to the fire that can be activated by pressing the special abilities key
- Many improvements to the destruction stone mechanic
- Now a piece of land places the earth in the world
- Now the solar explosion explodes only when exposed to moon rocks
- Removed merges of elements
- [Bugfix] Fixed the error net.minecraft.nbt.CompoundTag.m_128425_ String, int because int is null
- [Bugfix] The Time Stone can now be re-selected
- [Bugfix] Fixed the game rule of re-selecting a stone
You can download the mod by following the link: https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/keepers-of-the-stones
